tool.name: Recovery tool

param.name: removeOwl
param.label: remove the information, which is related to the OWL ontology itself

tool.help:
Recovery of the RDF structure from uploaded file or SPARQL endpoint. Do not use public endpoint because the structure recovery is very heavy for the endpoint. If Graph is specified only triples within the specified graph are recovered. If SPARQL endpoint need user name and password then please enter details otherwise leave empty.
The resulting local store can be further exported to either cytoscape session, OWL or ShEx file. Options to enable/disable the simplification step and option to remove the elements in the structure recovery which are related to the OWL ontology itself.
